default.O: This item is considered organic waste. Dispose in compost or green bin if available.
default.R: This item is recyclable. Please clean and dry before disposal.

New York.O: Organic waste is accepted in brown bins where composting is available.
New York.R: Recyclables must be clean. Place paper, plastic, and metal in the blue bin.

San Francisco.O: Place organic waste (food, yard scraps) in the green compost bin.
San Francisco.R: Place clean recyclables in the blue bin. Do not include plastic bags or film.
